verses.verse: And <WG2532> it came to pass <WG1096>, on <WG1722> one <WG1520> of the <WG1565> days <WG2250>, as he <WG846> was teaching <WG1321> the people <WG2992> in <WG1722> the temple <WG2411>, and <WG2532> preaching the gospel <WG2097>, there came upon <WG2186> him the chief priests <WG749> and <WG2532> the scribes <WG1122> with <WG4862> the elders <WG4245>;

and <WG2532> they spake <WG2036>, saying <WG3004> unto <WG4314> him <WG846>, Tell <WG2036> us <WG2254>: By <WG1722> what <WG4169> authority <WG1849> doest thou <WG4160> these things <WG5023>? or <WG2228> who <WG5101> is <WG2076> he that <WG3588> gave <WG1325> thee <WG4671> this <WG3778> authority <WG1849>?

And <WG1161> he answered <WG611> and said <WG2036> unto <WG4314> them <WG846>, I also <WG2504> will <WG2065> ask <WG2065> you <WG5209> a <WG1520> question <WG3056>; and <WG2532> tell <WG2036> me <WG3427>:
The baptism <WG908> of John <WG2491>, was it <WG2258> from <WG1537> heaven <WG3772>, or <WG2228> from <WG1537> men <WG444>?

And <WG1161> they reasoned <WG4817> with <WG4314> themselves <WG1438>, saying <WG3754>, If <WG1437> we shall say <WG2036>, From <WG1537> heaven <WG3772>; he will say <WG1223>, Why <WG5101> did <WG3767> ye <WG4100> not <WG3756> believe him <WG846>?

But <WG1161> if <WG1437> we shall say <WG2036>, From <WG1537> men <WG444>; all <WG3956> the people <WG2992> will stone <WG2642> us <WG2248>: for <WG1063> they are <WG1511> persuaded that <WG3982> John <WG2491> was <WG2076> a prophet <WG4396>.
And <WG2532> they answered <WG611>, that they <WG1492> knew <WG1492> not <WG3361> whence it was <WG4159>.
And <WG2532> Jesus <WG2424> said <WG2036> unto them <WG846>, Neither <WG3761> tell <WG3004> I <WG1473> you <WG5213> by <WG1722> what <WG4169> authority <WG1849> I do <WG4160> these things <WG5023>.

And <WG1161> he <WG756> began to speak <WG3004> unto <WG4314> the people <WG2992> this <WG3778> parable <WG3850>: A <WG5100> man <WG444> planted <WG5452> a vineyard <WG290>, and <WG2532> let <WG1554> it <WG846> out <WG1554> to husbandmen <WG1092>, and <WG2532> went into another country <WG589> for a long <WG2425> time <WG5550>.

And <WG2532> at <WG1722> the season <WG2540> he sent <WG649> unto <WG4314> the husbandmen <WG1092> a servant <WG1401>, that <WG2443> they should give <WG1325> him <WG846> of <WG575> the fruit <WG2590> of the vineyard <WG290>: but <WG1161> the husbandmen <WG1092> beat <WG1194> him <WG846>, and sent <WG1821> him away <WG1821> empty <WG2756>.

And <WG2532> he sent <WG3992> yet <WG4369> another <WG2087> servant <WG1401>: and <WG1161> him also <WG2548> they beat <WG1194>, and <WG2532> handled <WG818> him shamefully <WG818>, and sent <WG1821> him away <WG1821> empty <WG2756>.
And <WG2532> he sent <WG3992> yet a third <WG5154>: and <WG1161> him <WG5126> also <WG2532> they wounded <WG5135>, and cast <WG1544> him <WG5126> forth <WG1544>.

And <WG1161> the lord <WG2962> of the vineyard <WG290> said <WG2036>, What <WG5101> shall I do <WG4160>? I will send <WG3992> my <WG3450> beloved <WG27> son <WG5207>; it may be <WG2481> they will reverence1788, 1492 him <WG5126>.

But <WG1161> when the husbandmen <WG1092> saw <WG1492> him <WG846>, they reasoned <WG1260> one <WG4314> with another <WG1438>, saying <WG3004>, This <WG3778> is <WG2076> the heir <WG2818>; let <WG1205> us kill <WG615> him <WG846>, that <WG2443> the inheritance <WG2817> may be <WG1096> ours <WG2257>.

And <WG2532> they cast <WG1544> him <WG846> forth out of <WG1854> the vineyard <WG290>, and killed <WG615> him <WG5101>. What therefore <WG3767> will <WG4160> the lord <WG2962> of the vineyard <WG290> do <WG4160> unto them <WG846>?

He will come <WG2064> and <WG2532> destroy <WG622> these <WG5128> husbandmen <WG1092>, and <WG2532> will give <WG1325> the vineyard <WG290> unto others <WG243>. And when <WG1161> they heard <WG191> it <WG3361>, they said, God forbid <WG1096>.

But <WG1161> he looked <WG1689> upon them <WG846>, and said <WG2036>, What <WG5101> then <WG3767> is <WG2076> this <WG5124> that <WG3588> is written <WG1125>, The stone <WG3037> which <WG3739> the builders <WG3618> rejected <WG593>, The same <WG3778> was made <WG1096> the <WG1519> head <WG2776> of the corner <WG1137>?

Every <WG3956> one that falleth <WG4098> on <WG1909> that <WG1565> stone <WG3037> shall be broken <WG4917> to pieces <WG1161>; but on <WG1909> whomsoever3739, Leviticus2 it shall fall <WG4098>, it will scatter <WG3039> him <WG846> as dust <WG3039>.

And <WG2532> the scribes <WG1122> and <WG2532> the chief priests <WG749> sought <WG2212> to lay <WG1911> hands <WG5495> on <WG1909> him <WG846> in <WG1722> that very <WG846> hour <WG5610>; and <WG2532> they feared <WG5399> the people <WG2992>: for <WG1063> they perceived <WG1097> that <WG3754> he spake <WG2036> this <WG3778> parable <WG3850> against <WG4314> them <WG846>.

And <WG2532> they watched <WG3906> him <WG649>, and sent forth spies <WG1455>, who feigned <WG5271> themselves1438, 1511 to be righteous <WG1342>, that <WG2443> they might take hold <WG1949> of his <WG846> speech <WG3056>, so <WG2443> as to deliver <WG3860> him <WG846> up to <WG1519> the rule <WG746> and <WG2532> to the authority <WG746> of the governor <WG2232>.

And <WG2532> they asked <WG1905> him <WG846>, saying <WG3004>, Teacher <WG1320>, we know <WG1492> that <WG3754> thou sayest <WG3004> and <WG2532> teachest <WG1321> rightly <WG2532>, and <WG2532> acceptest <WG2983> not the person <WG4383> of any <WG235>, but of a <WG1909> truth <WG225> teachest <WG1321> the way <WG3598> of God <WG2316>:
Is it lawful <WG1832> for us <WG2254> to give <WG1325> tribute <WG5411> unto Caesar <WG2541>, or <WG2228> not <WG3756>?
But <WG1161> he perceived <WG2657> their <WG846> craftiness <WG3834>, and said <WG2036> unto <WG4314> them <WG846>,
Show <WG1925> me <WG3427> a denarius <WG1220>. Whose <WG5101> image <WG1504> and <WG2532> superscription <WG1923> hath it <WG2192>? And <WG1161> they said <WG611>, Caesar <WG2541>'s.

And <WG1161> he said <WG2036> unto them <WG846>, Then <WG5106> render <WG591> unto Caesar <WG2541> the things <WG3588> that are Caesar <WG2541>'s, and <WG2532> unto God <WG2316> the things <WG3588> that are God <WG2316>'s.

And <WG2532> they were not <WG3756> able <WG2480> to take hold <WG1949> of <WG846> the saying <WG4487> before <WG1726> the people <WG2992>: and <WG2532> they marvelled <WG2296> at <WG1909> his <WG846> answer <WG612>, and held their peace <WG4601>.
And <WG1161> there came to <WG4334> him certain <WG5100> of the Sadducees <WG4523>, they <WG3588> that <WG483> say that there is <WG1511> no <WG3361> resurrection <WG386>;

and they asked <WG1905> him <WG846>, saying <WG3004>, Teacher <WG1320>, Moses <WG3475> wrote <WG1125> unto us <WG2254>, that if <WG1437> a man <WG5100>'s brother <WG80> die <WG599>, having <WG2192> a wife <WG1135>, and <WG2532> he <WG3778> be <WG599> childless <WG815>, <WG2443> his <WG846> brother <WG80> should take <WG2983> the wife <WG1135>, and <WG2532> raise up <WG1817> seed <WG4690> unto his <WG846> brother <WG80>.
There were <WG2258> therefore <WG3767> seven <WG2033> brethren <WG80>: and <WG2532> the first <WG4413> took <WG2983> a wife <WG1135>, and died <WG599> childless <WG815>;
and <WG2532> the second <WG1208>:
and <WG2532> the third <WG5154> took <WG2983> her <WG846>; and <WG1161> likewise <WG5615> the seven <WG2033> also <WG2532> left <WG2641> no <WG3756> children <WG5043>, and <WG2532> died <WG599>.
Afterward <WG5305> the <WG3956> woman <WG1135> also <WG2532> died <WG599>.
In <WG1722> the resurrection <WG386> therefore <WG3767> whose <WG5101> wife <WG1135> of them <WG846> shall she <WG1096> be <WG1063>? for the seven <WG2033> had <WG2192> her <WG846> to wife <WG1135>.
And <WG2532> Jesus2424, 611 said <WG2036> unto them <WG846>, The sons <WG5207> of this <WG5127> world <WG165> marry <WG1060>, and <WG2532> are given in marriage <WG1548>:

but <WG1161> they that <WG3588> are accounted worthy <WG2661> to attain <WG5177> to that <WG1565> world <WG165>, and <WG2532> the resurrection <WG386> from <WG1537> the dead <WG3498>, neither <WG3777> marry <WG1060>, nor <WG3777> are given in marriage <WG1548>:

for neither <WG3777> can <WG1410> they die <WG599> any more <WG2089>: for <WG1063> they are <WG1526> equal unto the angels <WG2465>; and <WG2532> are <WG1526> sons <WG5207> of God <WG2316>, being <WG5607> sons <WG5207> of the resurrection <WG386>.

But <WG1161> that <WG3754> the dead <WG3498> are raised <WG1453>, even <WG2532> Moses <WG3475> showed <WG3377>, in the place <WG1909> concerning the Bush <WG942>, when <WG5613> he calleth <WG3004> the Lord <WG2962> the God <WG2316> of Abraham <WG11>, and <WG2532> the God <WG2316> of Isaac <WG2464>, and <WG2532> the God <WG2316> of Jacob <WG2384>.
Now <WG1161> he is <WG2076> not <WG3756> the God <WG2316> of the dead <WG3498>, but <WG235> of the living <WG2198>: for <WG1063> all <WG3956> live <WG2198> unto him <WG846>.
And <WG1161> certain <WG5100> of the scribes <WG1122> answering <WG611> said <WG2036>, Teacher <WG1320>, thou hast <WG2036> well <WG2573> said <WG2036>.
For <WG1161> they durst <WG5111> not <WG3765> any <WG3762> more ask <WG1905> him any question <WG846>.
And <WG1161> he said <WG2036> unto <WG4314> them <WG846>, How <WG4459> say they <WG3004> that the Christ <WG5547> is <WG1511> David <WG1138>'s son <WG5207>?

For <WG2532> David <WG1138> himself <WG846> saith <WG3004> in <WG1722> the book <WG976> of Psalms <WG5568>, The Lord <WG2962> said <WG2036> unto my <WG3450> Lord <WG2962>, Sit thou <WG2521> on <WG1537> my <WG3450> right hand <WG1188>,
Till2193, Leviticus2 I make <WG5087> thine <WG4675> enemies <WG2190> the footstool <WG4228> of thy feet <WG4675>.
David <WG1138> therefore <WG3767> calleth <WG2564> him <WG846> Lord <WG2962>, and how <WG4459> is he2076, 2532 his <WG846> son <WG5207>?
And <WG1161> in the hearing <WG191> of all <WG3956> the people <WG2992> he said <WG2036> unto his <WG846> disciples <WG3101>,

Beware <WG4337> of <WG575> the scribes <WG1122>, who <WG3588> desire <WG2309> to walk <WG4043> in <WG1722> long robes <WG4749>, and <WG2532> love <WG5368> salutations <WG783> in <WG1722> the marketplaces <WG58>, and <WG2532> chief seats <WG4410> in <WG1722> the synagogues <WG4864>, and <WG2532> chief places <WG4411> at <WG1722> feasts <WG1173>;

who <WG3739> devour <WG2719> widows <WG5503>' houses <WG3614>, and <WG2532> for a pretence <WG4392> make <WG4336> long <WG3117> prayers <WG4336>: these <WG3778> shall receive <WG2983> greater <WG4053> condemnation <WG2917>.
